hero.title: Rotaract Club of Bibwewadi Pune
hero.subtitle: From solos to symphony
hero.description: Join us in creating positive change and impacting lives through service, leadership, and community engagement.

about.title: Who We Are
about.description1: Rotaract is a youth organization of Rotary International for young and aspiring leaders (typically 18-30) who wish to grow their network and develop themselves both professionally and personally.
about.description2: The Rotaract Club of Bibwewadi Pune is committed to making a difference in our local community while fostering leadership, fellowship, and service among young professionals.
about.description3: We work across five main avenues: Professional Development, Community Service, Club Service, International Service, and Diversity, Equity & Inclusivity.

projects.title: Project Annapurna
projects.description: Food Donation Drive providing nutritious meals to underprivileged communities across Bibwewadi area.

projects.title: Skill Development Initiative
projects.description: Empowering youth with essential skills through workshops and training programs for better employment opportunities.

projects.title: Environmental Conservation
projects.description: Tree plantation drives and environmental awareness campaigns to create a greener, sustainable future.

projects.title: Digital Literacy Program
projects.description: Bridging the digital divide by teaching computer and internet skills to seniors and underserved communities.

events.title: Leadership Development Workshop
events.description: Interactive workshop on developing leadership skills and building effective teams. Perfect for young professionals looking to enhance their career prospects.

events.title: Community Clean-up Drive
events.description: Join us for a community service project focused on cleaning and beautifying our local parks and public spaces.

events.title: Networking Night & Fellowship
events.description: An evening of networking, fellowship, and fun activities. Connect with like-minded individuals and build lasting friendships.
